trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were 4 other sightings in Chicago on or around August 1st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsRadio head just finished their set at lollapalooza downtown chicago....my wife,daughter, and myself were waiting in line for the washroom. i was looking up just waiting and all of a sudden a bright white object appeared...east over lake michigan...i thought nothing of it there were helicopters every where...then it started moving south...southwest in rapid speed....about the speed of a fighter jet...without a sound....and i told my wife to look she looked up and saw it speed into a cloud and disappear...amazingly...no one else saw this thing....it was small bright white...and extremely fast
